definitions.text: not clearly understood or expressed; ; -Anatole Broyard; - P.A.Sorokin; - John Locke
examples: an impulse to go off and fight certain obscure battles of his own spirit
their descriptions of human behavior become vague, dull, and unclear
vague...forms of speech...have so long passed for mysteries of science

definitions.text: not precisely limited, determined, or distinguished

examples: a dim figure in the distance
saw a vague outline of a building through the fog
a few wispy memories of childhood
